mapper.select: SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD) AS POSITION_CD_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(DEPARTMENT_CD, 3), DEPARTMENT_CD) AS DEPARTMENT_CD_NAME FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE HR LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCOUNT_ROLE AR ON HR.EMPLOYEE_ID = AR.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE R ON AR.ROLE_NUM = R.ROLE_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE C ON R.ROLE_NAME = C.CODE WHERE HR.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{value}

SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD) AS POSITION_CD_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(DEPARTMENT_CD, 3), DEPARTMENT_CD) AS DEPARTMENT_CD_NAME FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE
LIMIT #{startRow}, 10
SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM CODE WHERE UP_CODE = 'D00'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HUMAN_RESOURCE ( EMPLOYEE_ID, PASSWORD, JOIN_DATE, JOIN_TYPE, NAME, BIRTH, DEPARTMENT_CD, POSITION_CD, EXTENSION_NUMBER, PHONE, MAIN_NUMBER, EMAIL, ADDRESS, BANK, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACCOUNT_HOLDER, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY, SIGNATURE, QUIT_DATE, QUIT_REASON, PROFILE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_MENU, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, MOD_MENU ) VALUES ( FN_EMPLOYEE_ID(), #{password}, #{joinDate}, #{joinType}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{departmentCd}, #{positionCd}, #{extensionNumber}, #{phone}, #{mainNumber}, #{email}, #{address}, #{bank}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountHolder}, #{approvalAuthority}, #{signature}, #{quitDate}, #{quitReason}, #{profile}, #{regId}, #{regDate}, #{regMenu}, #{modId}, #{modDate}, #{modMenu} )
